careeradvice.evaluation: Based on the system's analysis of your resume, your current position is <0>{{jobtitle}}</0>.
careeradvice.change direction: The profession your qualifications match is <0>{{matched_job}}</0>. However, this position is experiencing rapid replacement in the current market conditions. Market statistics show that in order to stay ahead of the game, it is recommended that your career is shifted towards the direction of <0>{{suggested_job}}</0>. To get started with this transition, explore the following modules to learn how you can succeed as a <0>{{suggested_job}}</0> : <0>{{suggested_job_skills}}</0>.
careeradvice.improve: The profession your qualifications match is <0>{{matched_job}}</0>. This position is currently popular in the market with good job prospects in the future. To further enhance your career opportunities, here are some areas of improvement: <0>{{skills_needed}}</0>. Expanding your knowledge and gaining more experience in these areas will increase your chances of obtaining higher level positions in your professional field.
